ADTEXT.message: Traži se: {commodity}. Platit ću {price} po toni

AMOUNT.description: The amount (for now in tonne) of goods person wants to buy
AMOUNT.message: Kupit ću sve što imaš, do {amount} iznosa koji mi treba.

MESSAGE.message: Ja sam {name}. Hitno mi treba {commodity} i platit ću dvostruku tržišnu cijenu ({price}).

NOT_IN_STOCK.description: Regarding selling more than the player has

SELL_ALL.description: Sell everything player has of the good/commodity

SELL_N.description: Sell several units (probably in tonne), i.e. N > 1
